# yozuk-skill-digest

Hash calculator.

## Examples

### Calculate MD5 and SHA-512

```
zuk md5 sha-512 < icon.svg
=>
MD5: e08dd71ead0f3a36ba61c755ff870eb4
SHA-512: 5659ec39462a470ba3b8eb57f8a22a8fa4f5354f8d84e767a8ac9ce335435ddad57921fa1e43240be1257671f2f56305833ad1e04d2c3e6dcb82cbd6a1871d01
```

### Calculate SHA3 families

```
cat *.txt | zuk sha3
=>
Keccak-224: ad692c04c2d3c0583667e35de5210f90e65c9c0a7aa0d1acb73ccdc0
Keccak-256: 3f6c2cce1ca94bec3880f3622c7795472d2a5a5807fef7a7a4c5814d7fcc14e9
Keccak-384: 8c1d3df9b68b2717bd2078e566e2ccd167c0e698e68036cc9ef79ae1497f1cae6abc02bb45fe8298d4746da47512d78d
Keccak-512: 34e7a4df849f7595e9bd09ea3a819c6d246c7c41c46d401c057b825a9f0edd272857e792156536a641112ca11b365bb2e07d86913f8704af7de3a5beb0fd1bda
SHA-3-224: 59c273e4e6aae9fc512ffc83834d52b221899c7c90214587997721b3
SHA-3-256: 324cfd516d72a96546277152f39c767b0caa872acda5d85b82b14f22f7bbf88b
SHA-3-384: d81a099523dbb44fb78f8a2d7ca85d972d50a2fbc7a586220e3a0364729045cf936ac358d3bb564ef7b41f164b29799e
SHA-3-512: f3c00b2e76f05ef2d59a2dab4fd63e15d0a8bff25f207ca3d768e68b903bf57abec652ca26bdd783fcb8d0b3351621a167771040bc6b73eb1987b5df23b3aae6
```
